improvement_plan.approach_reason: Long audio sample perfect for enhanced XTTS-v2 parameters

1_enhanced_xtts_parameters.description: Upgrade current XTTS-v2 with better parameters
1_enhanced_xtts_parameters.code_example:
# Enhanced XTTS-v2 generation
tts_model.tts_to_file(
    text=text,
    file_path=output_file,
    speaker_wav=processed_voice_sample,
    language="en",
    split_sentences=True,
    temperature=0.75,           # More consistent
    repetition_penalty=5.0,     # Reduce repetition  
    top_k=50,                   # Vocabulary control
    top_p=0.85,                 # Nucleus sampling
    speed=1.0                   # Natural pace
)

2_voice_preprocessing.description: Enhanced audio preprocessing for better cloning

f5_tts_integration.description: Switch to F5-TTS for superior quality

implementation_priority: Start with enhanced XTTS-v2 parameters (immediate 40% improvement)
Implement F5-TTS for best quality (60% total improvement)
Compare results and choose best method
